name: Cheaper, efficient, clean power generated locally and sometimes owned by the community.
description:
The Commonwealth create an agency with State and Local Government advisors to process renewable energy projects initiated by local communities to supply their energy needs and store or sell surplus.
Depending on the environment this could be energy generation from solar, wind or other sustainable projects. New jobs would be generated for local residents to train and maintain systems with the foresight of creating long-term opportunities for young people.
